# PKInkingTool.InkType

**Enumeration**

The type that defines the shape of stroked lines.

## Declaration

```swift
enum InkType
```

## Choosing ink types

- **PKInkingTool.InkType.marker**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a felt-tip marker.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.pen**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a pen-based drawing.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.pencil**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a narrow line from a pencil.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.monoline**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a monoline pen.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.fountainPen**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a calligraphy pen.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.watercolor**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a watercolor brush.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.crayon**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a crayon.

## Getting the width information

- **defaultWidth**: The default line width for the specified tool type.
- **validWidthRange**: The range of widths allowed for an ink of this type.

## Supporting backward compatibility

- **requiredContentVersion**: The version of PencilKit necessary to use the ink type.

## Enumeration Cases

- **PKInkingTool.InkType.reed**

## Getting the tool type

- **inkType**: The tool type that determines the shape of the rendered content.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
